events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position and will start processing it.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the keywords indicating software development skills.
A recruiter with experience in hiring software engineers has been assigned to move forward with the screening process.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening where technical experience and background in software development were assessed.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically accepted the invitation to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate advanced software engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
